short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An exciting theme for the browser in the style of gambling movies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple web browser theme for Google Chrome, created for those who like the feeling of excitement. Brand Slotsspot just started this activity and its web developers hope that the next versions will be only better.
